description.p: The Mapping Toolbox(TM) product provides a comprehensive set of functions and graphical user interfaces for building map displays and performing geospatial data analysis in MATLAB(R). The toolbox supports key mapping and geospatial data analysis, manipulation, and visualization tasks that are useful in applications such as earth and planetary scientific research, oil and gas exploration, environmental monitoring, insurance risk management, aerospace, defense, and security.

demoitem.label: Creating Maps from Geographic (Latitude, Longitude) Data
Creating Maps from Data in a Projected x-y System
Creating an Interactive Map for Selecting Point Features

demosection.label: Using Geospatial Analysis Tools and Formats

demoitem.label: Converting Coastline Data (GSHHS) to Shapefile Format
Exporting Vector Point Data to KML
Exporting Images and Raster Grids to GeoTIFF
Plotting a 3-D Dome as a Mesh Over a Globe
Georeferencing an Image to an Orthotile Base Layer

demoitem.label: Compositing and Animating Web Map Service (WMS) Meteorological Layers
